definition: low/beneath/to lower (one's head)/to let droop/to hang down/to incline
warm/lukewarm/temperature/to warm up/mild/soft/tender/to review (a lesson etc)/fever (TCM)/old variant of 瘟[wen1]

sentences.english: Research exceeds a general designation of science and technology below cold condition this kind to learn for microtherm .
sentences.chinese: 探究这种超冷状态下的科学技术统称为低温学。

sentences.english: Being applicable at low temperatures it offers a suitable alternative to coal tar epoxy.
sentences.chinese: 低温时，可作为环氧煤焦沥青漆的替代物。

sentences.english: The experiments were conducted in an ultra-high vacuum at the low temperature of 10 Kelvin, with the use of liquid helium.
sentences.chinese: 此次实验是在10开尔文低温的超真空环境中完成的。

sentences.english: The dormancy of seed of M. robusta is broke if stratified for 80 days.
sentences.chinese: 低温层积80天即可解除八棱海棠种子休眠。

sentences.english: The activities of CAT, a cold-sensitive enzyme, were decreased rapidly in both leaves and roots after chilling.
sentences.chinese: 低温弱光导致了叶片和根系中CAT活性的显著降低。

sentences.english: The cultivars with strong tolerance to chilling were easily induced by low temperature.
sentences.chinese: 耐冷性强的品种容易受低温诱导。
具有良好的耐低温性能。

sentences.english: Modification function of phosphoric acid to low temperature carbon based on polyacrylonitrile was investigated.
sentences.chinese: 研究了磷酸对聚丙烯腈基低温碳材料的改性作用。

sentences.english: The chilling sensitivity of stamen, pistil and fertilization of pepper at different stages was studied.
sentences.chinese: 现蕾期和开花期的花器官对低温的敏感性不同。

sentences.english: Their extremely low temperatures can produce cryogenic burns of the skin and freeze underlying tissue.
sentences.chinese: 它们的超低温会造成皮肤冻伤和皮下组织冻结。

sentences.english: The effects of the condensing layer of the cryopanel on the cryopump capabilities were analyzed.
sentences.chinese: 分析了液氦低温板的凝结层对低温泵性能的影响。

sentences.english: The effects of the condensing layer of the cryopanel on the cryopump capabilities were analyzed.
sentences.chinese: 分析了液氦低温板的凝结层对低温泵性能的影响。

sentences.english: Chinese dandelion seed has certain tolerant ability to high or low germination temperature.
sentences.chinese: 种子在萌发过程中对高低温有一定的耐受能力。

sentences.english: Fig. 3 shows a typical cryogenic liquid cylinder.
sentences.chinese: 典型的低温液体钢瓶如图3所示。

sentences.english: Heating in low temperature could prolong the shelf-life of the spiced beef in a certain extent.
sentences.chinese: 低温加热灭菌可在一定程度上延长卤牛肉的货架期。

sentences.english: We already know that, Combustible ice is a common product of low temperature and high pressure.
sentences.chinese: 我们已经知道，可燃冰是低温与高压的共同产物。

definition: to become cooler/to lower the temperature/cooling/(of interest, activity etc) to decline
